name: Shark Shark Run
description:
Experience Shark Shark Run, the horrifying simulation of a deadly killer shark who is on a rampage to gobble up all the holiday goers on the beach. They are known as one of the most dangerous wild animals in the sea waters. So get ready to become the crazy man eater to devour all the people on the shores.

This shark simulator offers us some great tactics to attack the tourists that come for holidays. But beware there are some hunters also who like teeth of sharks so don't go near them. Like playing shark games, this one is for you.

Features :

3D Shark Models.
Realistic environment.
Easy Controls
Upgrade your shark.
Newest shark simulator game.

If you have any problem in installation, please report to us at support@integerproductions.com. we will try to fix it as soon as possible.
